name: The Art of Revenge
description:
The Art of Revenge is a 2D side-scroller platformer where you draw enemies to kill NPCs that are running across the map.

Controls:

Press Escape to skip video cutscenes
Space - Advance Dialog
Left Mouse - Create enemy
1 - Change Enemy Type to Walker
2 - Change Enemy Type to Flyer
3 - Change Enemy Type to Bomb

The enemy type can be changed while drawing or not.

Drawing controls:

Left Mouse - Paint
Right Mouse - Erase
